name: Astral Battlers
description: Astral Battlers is an rpg from a fan of earthbound , working on releasing an alpha version for feedback on the development so far . You are the lost and unlikely hero swept up into a journey across a world under the control of Happy-Happy  , who isn't as happy as he pretends to be.  Meeting friends and gaining amazing powers as you help rid the world of chaos. Checkout it out
